input_args.instruction: 'Context: Disease non-alcoholic steatohepatitis associates Gene PNPLA3Disease non-alcoholic fatty liver disease associates Gene PNPLA3\nQuestion: Out of the given list, which Gene is associated with non-alcoholic steatohepatitis and non-alcoholic fatty liver disease. Given list is: HLA-DQB2,  ZFPM2,  KALRN, PNPLA3,  DENND1A'
